name: Ext.dom.Layer
doc: An extended Ext.dom.Element object that supports a shadow and shim

deprecated.text: Ext.dom.Element now includes support for shadow and shim see enableShadow and enableShim

members.name: cls
members.doc: CSS class to add to the element

members.name: constrain
members.short_doc: False to disable constrain to viewport. ...

members.name: dh
members.doc: DomHelper object config to create element with.
members.short_doc: DomHelper object config to create element with. ...

members.name: hideMode
members.doc:
A String which specifies how this Layer will be hidden. Values may be:

  • 'display' : The Component will be hidden using the display: none style.
  • 'visibility' : The Component will be hidden using the visibility: hidden style.
  • 'offsets' : The Component will be hidden by absolutely positioning it out of the visible area of the document. This is useful when a hidden Component must maintain measurable dimensions. Hiding using display results in a Component having zero dimensions.
members.short_doc: A String which specifies how this Layer will be hidden. ...

members.name: shadow
members.doc: True to automatically create an Ext.Shadow, or a string indicating the shadow's display Ext.Shadow.mode. False to disable the shadow.
members.short_doc:
True to automatically create an Ext.Shadow, or a string indicating the
shadow's display Ext.Shadow.mode. ...

members.name: shadowOffset
members.doc: Number of pixels to offset the shadow
members.short_doc: Number of pixels to offset the shadow ...

members.name: shim
members.short_doc: True to automatically create a Ext.dom.Shim. ...

members.name: useDisplay
members.doc: Defaults to use css offsets to hide the Layer. Specify true to use css style 'display:none;' to hide the Layer.
members.short_doc: Defaults to use css offsets to hide the Layer. ...

members.name: visibilityCls
members.doc: The CSS class name to add in order to hide this Layer if this layer is configured with hideMode: 'asclass'

params.name: existingEl
params.doc: Uses an existing DOM element. If the element is not found it creates it.

short_doc: An extended Ext.dom.Element object that supports a shadow and shim ...
